USGS Gage Retrieval Tools

USGSGage.Rd

This class retrieves data for a USGS gage.

Details

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

USGSGage$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
